memberdef.name: BSP_ERROR_CHECK_RETURN_ERR
memberdef.initializer: do { \ esp_err_t err_rc = (x); \ if (err_rc != ESP_OK) { \ ESP_LOGE(TAG, "Error %s at line %d", esp_err_to_name(err_rc), __LINE__); \ return err_rc; \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Macro to check ESP error codes and return on failure with logging.
Logging tag for ESP Menu component.
Initializes the ESP Menu system, including I2C, OLED display, rotary encoders, and LVGL.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes the ESP Menu system, including OLED display and rotary encoders.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t ESP_OK on success, or an error code on failure.
